Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds expectations, making it a valuable addition to any collection or endeavor. Considering its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $750000. I trust this proposition will resonate with your appreciation for quality and exclusivity. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional piece with someone who will cherish it as much as I have. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
